label: Ingredient Interaction & Risk Synergy Analysis
description: Analyze synergistic effects and safety risks of honey ingredient pairs by combining compound-SMILES pairs

defaultInputs.name: Compound List
defaultInputs.description: List of compounds with SMILES strings
defaultInputs.tooltip: Input table of compounds with names and SMILES strings. The module will analyze all possible pairs for synergistic effects and safety risks.

defaultOutputs.name: Pair
defaultOutputs.tooltip: The pair of compounds being analyzed (e.g., 'D-Glucose + Ferulic acid').

defaultOutputs.name: Predicted Synergistic Signal
defaultOutputs.tooltip: The predicted synergy signal indicating the type of interaction between the compound pair.

defaultOutputs.name: Synergy Type (Dominant)
defaultOutputs.tooltip: The dominant synergy type (e.g., 'Matrix facilitation', 'Stability enhancement', 'Functional complementarity').

defaultOutputs.name: Confidence
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Confidence level for the predicted interaction (High, Medium–High, Medium, Low–Medium).

defaultOutputs.name: Flag
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Flag indicating the risk level (SAFE, LOW_RISK, MODERATE_RISK).

configSchema.label: Compound List (Paste)
configSchema.tooltip: Paste compound names and SMILES strings, one per line, separated by comma. Format: CompoundName,SMILES

configSchema.label: Upload Compound File
configSchema.tooltip: Upload a CSV or TXT file containing compound names and SMILES strings. Required columns: compound name/identifier and SMILES.

configSchema.label: Model
configSchema.tooltip:
**DeepDDI** - detailed, human-readable interaction predictions; 
 **Decagon** - network-scale side effect & synergy modeling.

configSchema.label: Analysis Mode
configSchema.tooltip: Choose whether to analyze all possible compound pairs or only selected pairs.

configSchema.label: Risk Threshold
configSchema.tooltip: Minimum confidence threshold for flagging high-risk interactions (0-1 scale).
